all_findings.title: Unchecked external call in assembly
all_findings.description: Assembly call at line 23 may not check return value

evidence.recommendation: Check return value and handle failures

all_findings.title: Unchecked external call in assembly
all_findings.description: Assembly call at line 37 may not check return value

evidence.recommendation: Check return value and handle failures

all_findings.title: Low-level call without reentrancy protection
all_findings.description: External call at line 23 may be reentered

evidence.recommendation: Add reentrancy guard or use checks-effects-interactions

all_findings.title: Memory operation in assembly
all_findings.description: Memory operation at line 42 can corrupt Solidity memory

evidence.recommendation: Ensure memory operations don't overlap with Solidity

all_findings.title: Memory operation in assembly
all_findings.description: Memory operation at line 33 can corrupt Solidity memory

evidence.recommendation: Ensure memory operations don't overlap with Solidity

all_findings.title: Potential DoS via Unbounded Loop
all_findings.description: Line 143: Loop over array length can cause out-of-gas errors. Consider pagination or gas limits.

all_findings.title: Rounding direction not specified
all_findings.description: Division at line 6 may have exploitable rounding

evidence.recommendation: Explicitly specify rounding direction (favor protocol or user)

all_findings.title: Rounding direction not specified
all_findings.description: Division at line 119 may have exploitable rounding

evidence.recommendation: Explicitly specify rounding direction (favor protocol or user)

all_findings.title: Economic attack - exploitable rounding
all_findings.description: Division at line 119 may have exploitable rounding direction

evidence.recommendation: Explicitly handle rounding to favor protocol or user consistently

all_findings.title: Staticcall assumption may be violated
all_findings.description: Staticcall at line 23 assumes no state changes

evidence.recommendation: Verify staticcall prevents state changes

all_findings.title: Potentially Problematic for Loop
all_findings.description: For loop detected with storage writes (high gas cost)

provenance.fix_suggestion: Ensure loop has clear exit condition and minimize gas costs

all_findings.title: Gas manipulation in assembly
all_findings.description: Gas operation at line 38 can enable gas griefing

evidence.recommendation: Avoid forwarding all gas in external calls

all_findings.title: Unreachable Code in assertRelApproxEq
all_findings.description: Code after return statement is unreachable

provenance.fix_suggestion: Remove unreachable code or move return statement

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @notice for modifier 'brutalizeMemory'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec @notice describing the purpose and effects.

all_findings.title: Array length not cached in loop
all_findings.description: Loop at line 143 reads array.length on every iteration

evidence.recommendation: Cache array.length in a local variable before the loop

all_findings.title: Use delete keyword instead of assignment to zero
all_findings.description: Setting to zero at line 143 could use delete keyword for gas refund

evidence.recommendation: Use delete variable instead of variable = 0

all_findings.title: Use ++i instead of i++ in loops
all_findings.description: Post-increment at line 143 costs more gas than pre-increment

evidence.recommendation: Change i++ to ++i to save gas

all_findings.title: Loop counter increment could be unchecked
all_findings.description: Loop counter at line 143 uses checked arithmetic unnecessarily

evidence.recommendation: Wrap loop counter increment in unchecked block (Solidity 0.8+)

all_findings.title: Modifier adds gas overhead
all_findings.description: Modifier at line 18 adds deployment gas

evidence.recommendation: Consider inlining simple modifiers if used only once

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of string messages
all_findings.description: Require at line 141 uses string error message (expensive)

evidence.recommendation: Define custom errors and use revert CustomError() (Solidity 0.8.4+)

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of string messages
all_findings.description: Require at line 153 uses string error message (expensive)

evidence.recommendation: Define custom errors and use revert CustomError() (Solidity 0.8.4+)

all_findings.title: Consider using != instead of >
all_findings.description: Greater-than at line 100 costs more than not-equal

evidence.recommendation: If checking for zero, use != 0 instead of > 0

all_findings.title: Consider using != instead of >
all_findings.description: Greater-than at line 102 costs more than not-equal

evidence.recommendation: If checking for zero, use != 0 instead of > 0

all_findings.title: Consider using != instead of >
all_findings.description: Greater-than at line 119 costs more than not-equal

evidence.recommendation: If checking for zero, use != 0 instead of > 0

all_findings.title: Consider using != instead of >
all_findings.description: Greater-than at line 121 costs more than not-equal

evidence.recommendation: If checking for zero, use != 0 instead of > 0

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 141 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();

all_findings.title: Cache array length outside loop
all_findings.description: Array length read at line 141 in loop condition

evidence.recommendation: Store .length in local variable before loop

evidence.recommendation: Store .length in local variable before loop

all_findings.description: Private/internal variable "virtual" at line 116 should start with _

evidence.recommendation: Prefix private/internal variables with underscore (e.g., _myVar)

evidence.recommendation: Add @return in function NatSpec
